website_summaries.verdict: While it's built like a rock and has lots of nice features, others cost less and offer similar benefits.
pros: Solid build is streamlined and easy to carry
Two USB ports plus an AC outlet
can even be charged in your car
cons: Expensive, and we wish it offered longer battery life considering the price

customer_reviews.title: Best portable power source ever!
customer_reviews.text: As an tech geek, this is one of my favorite tools. It charged phones and other gadgets faster than anything else. The universal DC input is very convenient. My favorite feature is the adjustable DC output though. As an electrical engineer, it acts as a handy reasonably-accurate portable DC power supply. I've pushed it beyond it's specs powering devices I probably shouldn't be (drones), and even with voltage spikes or overcurrent, it just shuts off the output with no damage. At first I thought the integrated fan was overkill - it's not. It's necessary for delivering high power DC, even with great conversion efficiency. Everything about the Omnicharge is well designed, well thought-out, and highly practical.
customer_reviews.author: DanFitz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. I love that I can charge my phone and charge the battery at the same time. Such a nice feature. I pretty much just take this thing on vacation instead of an actual charger.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Built to last, great power.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Bought the Omnicahrge 20 to bring with me to a year long assignment in Angola. Also bought the tips pack and the case. As others have noted, I would love for the case to hold the adapter as well. As for use. I can get a full re-charge of my Thinkpad, pretty quickly. Of course smaller appliances charge a few times over. I could wait for the UBS-C version, so I had to buy an adapter for my new Dell, but it works fine. Overall, a great package.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Flores

customer_reviews.title: Charger for every Device
customer_reviews.text: This is a “one size fits all” charger for the Person on the go. It has everything you need for every device. This also charges my Surface Pro 6 with no problems. With the AC or with DC with the Accessory Cable. If your device is equipped for Wireless charging this charger has you covered.. My biggest surprise was that I found out this device holds a charge for very long time..
customer_reviews.author: Robert Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Power on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought it for some backup power for my CPAP machine on a future trip to Thailand. Tested unit at home and it seems to function as expected. I will add to this review when I will be back from the trip to review the item after using it in a real life situation.
customer_reviews.author: Ken B.

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose charger!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great! It charges fast, and provides all the power I need. It’s the perfect size and weight for traveling. I never feel like it’s cumbersome or heavy, something that I’ve been worried about when considering this product. It does a great job even when hooked up to 3+ devices (iPhone, MacBook, and AirPods). If you’re looking for something reliable this is it. The one con though, is that the prongs on the charging cube are weak. It snapped the day after I got it, so will be ordering a replacement. All in all, a great charger for all power-based needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smart, Reliable + Versatile, yet minimal.
customer_reviews.text: The Omni 20 is by far the fastest and most versatile portable charger. I use it to charge anything from my phone, to my camera and drone batteries and even my laptop. I generally keep this with me wherever I go and if I’m working at a library or coffee shop and can’t get to a wall plug, I have no problem pullin out my Omni 20 because of it’s sleek design and minimal look. The buttons and display that let you control and view your charging are absolutely genius additions.
customer_reviews.author: anders Bybjerg

customer_reviews.title: Almost too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: This product may actually be from the future. It does everything as promised, and it does it beautifully. Wireless charging at about 7-8W in the sweet spot, output voltage is easily tunable from 1-24V in 0.1V steps. AC outlet works flawlessly (but be aware that it outputs a modified sine wave which isn't great for some electronics), and it will charge from literally any DC laptop charger if you have the right adapter. I can't give this product enough praise. 6/5 Stars. Well done, folks!
customer_reviews.author: gginandtonicc

customer_reviews.title: Bundle is a great option. Battery is very high quality & AC input make it versatile
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item and especially the bundle pricing and all accessories that come with it. The charger has really helped me get more freedom than trying to always look for an AC outlet. It charges my Surface Pro almost to 90% and then I can put the charger to charge until the battery drains then use it again and again :). I tried the RavPower but this one is for sure a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Shady Kamel

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: No longer use wall outlets. This charges fast with a solar panel. Will charge my full size asus laptop completely or my phone every night all week. Auto shut off when device being charged is full which is nice. Durable coating keeps it from getting scratches and very portable and light.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Almost exactly what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: First off...this product is packaged very well. I almost don't want to get rid of the box. The case is great and of high quality and the power bank also feels and looks like something of quality. The display is nice too. The only improvement I could suggest at this point is to have a larger area for wireless charging. You have to be a bit particular about where you place your device on top of the power bank...it has to sit a bit towards the rear of the charger to be recognized. Other than that...works as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: sky tetsuka

customer_reviews.title: ONe of the best chargeres I have met
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it gives an aaccurate LCD display of your charges and you can regulate the charge capabilitites
customer_reviews.author: Dr Alok Modi MD

customer_reviews.title: Check all the connectors while under warranty
customer_reviews.text: The charging tip for the Mac which is why I bought it appeared to not work. After contacting the company I learned my error was in not setting up the output level. It works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amalia Hermosillo

customer_reviews.title: Love it - needs the case
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Not inexpensive but well built and options for connecting and charging every device. Dinged one star as at this price, should come with the case (available separately at extra cost) which is necessary to keep from inadvertent activation when in your bag.
customer_reviews.author: SAINT2

customer_reviews.title: Versatile charging!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 20+ bundle (charger/case/usb c with international plugs/c to c cable and a to c cable). The box it came in holds everything, but the protective case only holds the battery. There are cable loops within the case but not enough clearance to hold both the battery and the cable, let alone the additional charger and swap plugs. I'll probably look for a new case to hold everything. Charger works as it should and is meant for travel with pass through charging, swap plugs, and usb c future-proofing.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality and form factor!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with how portable this charger is and how it has an AC outlet that allows me to charge my Razer Blade 13 w/GTX 1650 at full speed. It charges a Macbook Pro 13 and my chromebooks via the USB-C port. Overall pretty happy with my purchase. I do wish it had come with the DC charger instead of a USB c charger, This way I can charge the battery at the same time I charge my other USB C devices.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Works great and charges phones multiple times.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best power bank I have used. Has tons of attachments to make sure it works with almost any laptop and device. multiple output voltage options with option of plugging in your own power cord in it. Battery status gives real time info about exact power left. Overall, a little heavy but worth it. It even charges my Pixel device at least 4 times on a single charge.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great product! Compact charger for what it does with ac and dc outputs... All you need on the go!!! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kociol

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Works okay so far. As others have stated, their customer service is non-existent. Support slow to respond (if at all). This is not good for such an expensive product.
customer_reviews.author: FoxHound

customer_reviews.title: Unmatched flexibility
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I own quite a few different 10,000mah batteries with various forms of USB, QC3.0, Qi, and USB PD, and this blows them all out of the water. Yes it's bigger, but having all of the DC charging capabilities PLUS the AC outlet is really spectacular. Also it's fun to geek out on the stats the OLED screen shows. A bit pricey, but super well built and nice to have a single solution that takes care of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely an amazing power pack for every one of your electronics!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this as i am a power user and always travel with a battery pack for all my gadgets. This is a high quality built power tool feels premium especially with the bundle package. Spend the extra $36. You wouldnt be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Anil Soman

customer_reviews.title: This is a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I gave up several years ago on a power backup that did not work very well. After a few days without power recently, I decided to do some research. The Omnicharge 20+ seemed to be a great choice through product features and user reviews--and it is just what I need. Quick and simple to use, it charged my iPhone quickly as well as provides power for my ultrabook computer. Now I will have a reliable alternate power source for my electronics!
customer_reviews.author: CarolK

customer_reviews.title: Lamborghini of power banks
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve had this charger for sometime now. And I love it! Not only is super clean and sleek looking it powerful. I have a pretty big collection of power banks, and this one is the best. I use this to charge my IPhone and my Galaxy Note. And it’s no time to charge them both. By the way, it takes no time to charge the unit itself.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy & Quentece

customer_reviews.title: Better than your average charger
customer_reviews.text: While more expensive than most, some serious thought went into this device. You won't regret owning one, taking a trip overseas, will report back on use later.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camping companion
customer_reviews.text: The Omni 20+ is the perfect travel battery to bring camping. This past weekend I camped deep in the wilderness for three nights and the Omni was always there to keep my phone, lights and even a small drone all charged. I had hoped to be able to top it off using a small solar panel, however we didn't get any direct sunlight. Still, the battery was able to keep everything going and certainly helped make the trip a success.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vreeland

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: So when I opened the box it looks professional feels professional and I gotta say so far it's amazing. At 20% I was able to fully charge my phone a flash light and headset. Only thing that's iffy is to charge this bad boy the USB-C kinda struggled to fit in at first I have to kinda angle it and it's in tight. Hopefully its not an issue for later but for right now it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin & Emilio :)

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product, and I must say that my first impression of this item is that it is very well made and designed. I purchased this product for traveling internationally and I must honestly say that although I have not yet put this bank through its paces, I am very impressed with the build quality and versatility in power options. I am very excited to see what this thing can do and how well it does it.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect charger on the market
customer_reviews.text: I would give this charger 5 out of 5 stars, but only wish they had 100w usb C and having an DC and AC outlet. Beside that it a great charge. Good size with a lot of good information on the the screen. I am actually surprise how fast it wireless charge my phone compared the the wireless charger i have from Samsung that was built for the phone. I was most an Anker power bank user, but this thing is great!
customer_reviews.author: anthony pham

customer_reviews.title: This is the best portable charger by far.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this charger for over a month now and I couldn't imagine a portable charger could get much better. Everything that I have thrown at this charger it has handled without issue. I highly recommend this charger if you find yourself traveling or just away from access to power on a regular bases. It is a bit of an investment for a charger but I do think it is worth it. You will not need another charger for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Justin R Sears

customer_reviews.title: Charging!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for multiple charging. Lightweight. Easy to use. Charging companion on the go. Looking forwarding to getting the solar charging accessory.
customer_reviews.author: CarlB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little thing
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy i got the bundle. The case is amazing, the whole thing is amazing. It does weigh a couple pounds, but it's compact and does so much.
customer_reviews.author: knightme01

customer_reviews.title: The ability to edit photographs ir use the Surface pro with out worrying about battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to charge my Surface pro whilst out. I do not need to worry about power problems. I can edit when ever i want, with out the searching for a place to keep my battery charged. Whilst shooting tethered I have the knowledge, that i have the portable power to keep my devices charged. A wonderful item. I do not go out without it being in my bag,
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hart

customer_reviews.title: Charged my phone, 2013 MacBook Pro, and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Charged my phone, 2013 MacBook Pro, and my 2016 Lenovo laptops with no problem. Very handy. Recharges really quickly. we charged ours in the car as we drove around doing disaster cleanup in Puerto Rico after this last hurricane.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Parker

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The package came in undamaged. I was able to drain the power via wireless charging. The unit is fully charged so only time will tell. The menu navigation seems intuitive but selecting an option was a bit confusing as the same button was used to navigate out of the menu. It would have been nice if there was a single sheet explaining how to navigate around the menu.
customer_reviews.author: Chewbacca

customer_reviews.title: Best Battery Bank
customer_reviews.text: This battery bank is awesome. I bought it for the ability to have 120V AC out in a battery back and I have so far not been disappointed. I think the Omni 13+ might be the perfect size for a pocket battery bank and might be a later purchase. I was also happy to find that he USB C connection will charge my laptop as well. I was unable to verify that before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Schultz

customer_reviews.title: good but confirm compatability with computer
customer_reviews.text: Good batter life for its size, nice display panel with real time consumption. None of the adapters provided in the bundle allowed direct charging my Dell laptop, had to use laptop power cable and plug into Omnicharge but that is not the most efficient due to losses in AC/DC conversion. Now need to purchase additional adapter
customer_reviews.author: far-be-it

customer_reviews.title: Charge or Run your Electronic Devices!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item with the sole purpose of becoming more mobile with my Production Equipment. I can run my Zoom Livetrak L-12 mixer for 4+ hours, with Omni fully charged! Not to mention lightning quick smartphone charging. May have to purchase one more of these.
customer_reviews.author: 78 Ways Studio

customer_reviews.title: Just W-O-W!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! This simply replaced all power banks for my various devices. It really encourages me to contribute towards similar crowd funding projects. Can't wait to hear what's next on this product line.
customer_reviews.author: SAI RAM PURALA CHETTY

customer_reviews.title: Missing cables?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Omni 20+ Pro Bundle partly because it included the DC to Surface Connect cable. "DC to Surface Cable already included in Omni 20 Pro Bundle" I received my bundle today. Everything looks good, but no DC cables at all. It looks like I can charge it from the quick charger via USB C cable, but no DC in or out cables were included.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W Jose

customer_reviews.title: One of the best chargers around.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone tries to do too much with powerbanks, this one tops them all. USB C in and out - USB ports - Wireless charging - what more could you ask for?! The construction of this is top notch and having the LED display on it also makes you aware of how much charge you have left, not just four dots where you are left to guessing. Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Atsoca

customer_reviews.title: Best item i bought so far
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Best item bought so far. Never run out of battery because I have this as a back up. I charge my cell, fitbit, my sons tablet and phone.
customer_reviews.author: MichieWhyte

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Portable Charger
customer_reviews.text: The Omni 20 has been nothing but helpful so far. I've charged all of my electronic devices off of it, and had no issues. I'm extremely impressed with how much power the Omni 20 holds - I haven't had the battery go below 20% yet, and I've used it frequently on multiple day trips without charging it. It's also great that it comes with every cable you'll need. If you're looking for a new portable charger, this is an amazing choice.
customer_reviews.author: Myles Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, slick, advanced, easy to use, and high quality. I've owned dozens of batteries and have never paid this much for one. This bad boy was worth every dime! Great features, global usage, and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: JCV

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and quality built
customer_reviews.text: I like the finish, the different charging capabilities, and size. I don't like that it's only 20,000 mah and peaks at 100w output. Eh.. Decent enough for a power-bank that is also a portable wall outlet.
customer_reviews.author: DzNuts619

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing and I will never again be worried about charging when I’m traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: Best power bank money can buy small and compact portable Best battery pack money can buy is small and portable
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Compact yet Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Taking this device on an African photo safari in April to keep camera batteries charged. I was surprised how compact it is yet how incredibly powerful it is as well. There are a multiple charging options available for this device which makes it very flexible and useful in the field. My only nit is that the manual is a little thin on details. All in all a top drawer product.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Milnes

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this Power was out for a couple days and this got us through all our charging needs
customer_reviews.author: HardCorps™

customer_reviews.title: Be Aware Bundle Contents Have Changed
customer_reviews.text: The updated 20+ bundle includes the case and rapid charger but does not include the charging tips for the barrel port. This was a bit confusing in the description. However I was provided the MagSafe 2 cable I really needed by the manufacturer so all is good and am happy with the purchase. .
customer_reviews.author: dbirkhead

customer_reviews.title: Nice but......
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice but mine is defective... the DC outport came completely inoperable. Will wait for response from the manufacturer to see how the will repair
customer_reviews.author: n_morgan

customer_reviews.title: Compact and versatile accessories! You won't need another travel charger.
customer_reviews.text: I like how compact it is and makes it so easy to travel with. I love the wireless charging feature in particular, which makes it easier to charge multiple devices. Additionally, I like the A/C and D/C inputs and all the accessories for charging a Surface and MacBook household like ours!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: The product is well built with a lot of power. Really impressive look and feel. The display is great with all the details and power usage. This is a good companion for travelers. Wireless charging and ac outlet is great for travelers. I am impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gino George

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, But Still Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old Belkin USB power bank with the Omni 20+, and while the Omni is significantly heavier than my old one, the added features and quality of the manufacturing make the extra weight while traveling worth it. Would def recommend to others looking for an all-in-one charging solution.
customer_reviews.author: Sam George

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended not $$$$
customer_reviews.text: This was capable of charging my mac laptop only to 30%
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Galvez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use, long battery life, sleek design, and safe
customer_reviews.author: D.hogan

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and a total tank all in one!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Battery Tank. Having a portable battery bank that can charge almost anything is amazing, but this thing right here goes far and beyond that. Really recommend this for anyone looking to buy a all in one battery bank. Promise you wont be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Luis M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Lots of different charging options, very versatile. Lots of power but too big to carry in a pocket. Customer service was great. I had a question and emailed them. I recieved a response in a couple of hours. Highly recommend if you need a lot of power and space isn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best PortablePower Bank!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best I have ever used as a power bank! I have gone through 4 power banks and by far this is the most versatile of them all. If you travel a lot and are using your devices a lot, this is the perfect power bank for you!
customer_reviews.author: Roshni Patel

customer_reviews.title: It charges whatever you need it to. Period
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of electronics, and as a truck driver, lounges are always crowded and outlets are hard to come by. The omnicharge keeps my phone, Nintendo switch, iPad, MacBook and everything charged while I have downtime. Best investment I’ve made for my electronics everyday carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced under performing hard to use not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: The wireless phone charger is very sketchy. Hard to position just right. It’s not a quick charger. LED is tiny. It randomly stops charging other devices for no reason Totally depleted in one iPad Pro charge. Overall it doesn’t perform to the companies claims. Looks bad ass though.
customer_reviews.author: jim Sonzero

customer_reviews.title: Only one issue
customer_reviews.text: The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because the wifi charge doesn't always continuously charge my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Havinfunluvin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I’m court reporter and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Eyre

customer_reviews.title: Wont be Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting to purchase this Battery Backup Powerbank since it was on kickstarter. When I realized it was on Amazon when I was in the market for a new one it was a must buy. I have not been disappoint and everything about it is amazing! If you are in the market this is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: smjock63

customer_reviews.title: I was excited to receive my Omnicharge 20, only ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive my Omnicharge 20, only to find a defective unit. Worked for five minutes before battery was fully depleted. I attempted to calibrated and recharge with no success. Unit will not charge or turn on. It's been on the charger for over 7 hours with no change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact power house
customer_reviews.text: Compact package to charge up laptops and such. I’m a traveling professional and this is the perfect companion to get juice to work throughout the day. The ac outlet is the killer feature in a compact flat form factor to fit in a bag
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Powerhouse! Took this little monster to Japan and kept the pocket wifi charged all day at the same time as a Samsung Note 4 and S8. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High end product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the overall build quality and that it does what's advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Phill

customer_reviews.title: Third one, these are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is my third omnicharge. I backed the original kickstarter, bought a second one, and just purchased with the wireless charging. Theyre a little heavy, but its my only power source I need to take with me when I travel. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HowlingWolfCollectibles

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me. I’m in grad school and I don’t always have access to an outlet for my laptop. I’m sure it will be invaluable when we get back to class.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Needs and upgrade
customer_reviews.text: One port stop charging the Omni and the wireless surface area is small and in the back instead of the center and covering the whole surface
customer_reviews.author: EJ Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, does what is says osd little weird to get use to
customer_reviews.author: Donald Rauch Jr

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it a few days, but it seems to be exactly what I was looking for. Charges multiple devices. Charges devices quickly. Used it on a laptop that was down to 10%. Fully charged it, while I was using it, with no problem. As long as it works for a reasonable period, I'll be happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best of all Portable Chargers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, no question about it, from charging your ipad, iphone, external devices, mac etc, it just works great, with everything you throw at it, charge super fast, a superior product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: totally amazing power bank
customer_reviews.text: Best power bank for me to charge my cameras and drone and fast charger is amazing. wireless charging is good. AC outlet is impressive. loved it.
customer_reviews.author: yo

customer_reviews.title: Battery last for the whole day
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of the power bank, no more looking for power outlets, my family uses it for everything when we go out, cellphones, laptops, and games.
customer_reviews.author: sockmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome feature set, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I travel frequently, and have been looking for an upgrade to my old, USB-only battery pack I've been using. Love the feature set and the A/C plug. Nothing at all to complain about so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Sherrer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is okay and the build quality is great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently using this product for camping trips for charging up my phone and mini Bluetooth speaker and I have to say this product is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Compagner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for my Wacom Mobile Studio 13"
customer_reviews.text: Gets incredibly while using with my Wacom Mobile studio. Still had to use the AC Power cord. But it does make my daily use with my favorite tablet last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Augustene

customer_reviews.title: Great product to purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Omni charge power station and it’s really been I huge help with charging my devices very impressed would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Super versatile charger that's perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Love this charger, amazing variety of connections and features that make it perfect for traveling with any kind of tech and gear. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A

customer_reviews.title: Durable,premium and got good battery life
customer_reviews.text: I just got the powerbank today, and im really happy with my purchase.i would definitely recommend to anyone whos looking for a best battery with with great size and features.
customer_reviews.author: Vishal Khehra

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I couldn't be happier. I use it very often when I am on the road, when I am in a different office, or when I am just camping in the weekend with family and friends. Very fast charge especially when charging multiple devices.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase in quite some time...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product! It is amazing, does everything I need it to and more. From a dead Surface Book to 50% charged with this little battery was amazing.

product_meta.title: Omni 20+ Bundle AC/DC/USB-C Power Bank - Bundle with Protective Case and Fast Charger | Battery Pack for Laptops, Tablets, Cameras, Smartphones, iPhone, Samsung and Other Smart Devices
feature_bullets: Superior Power: Omnicharge is the first smart power bank with AC/DC outlets to charge your laptops, DSLR cameras, & more

Powerful and Flexible: Equipped with fast charging USB ports, 100W AC outlet and a high quality 20,000 mAh battery, the Omni will keep you powered on-the-go and meets FAA safety guidelines for air travel
Laptop Grade USB-C: Equipped with high powered 60W USB-C Ports, the Omni 20+ is capable of powering even the most demanding USB-C laptops like MacBooks, Lenovo, Dell and more
Wireless Charging: Leave your charging cable at home and charge your wireless compatible phone just by placing your phone on top of the Omni 20+
Real-time data: The Omni 20 provides real-time power management capabilities displayed through an OLED screen and comes with intelligent charging, resulting in the optimal charge for each device

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars327 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
